about_the_game:
Drift Abyss is a VR exploration game equipped with procedural terrain generation and unconventional yet intuitive movement options. Walk, climb and glide to discover unique and versatile landscapes across the planet.

Terrain Generation

Drift Abyss prioritizes creating a completely unique environment for each user and playthrough. To achieve this, all generated biomes receive their own “gene” containing modular pieces of program that can mutate and evolve. Explore to uncover more crazy and possibly beautiful points of interest.

Movement

Drift Abyss experiments with an immersive, full-body locomotion system. Swing your arms to walk, grip onto any surface to climb, and physically flap with your arms to fly. Break a sweat without even noticing them while discovering places.

Future plans

Drift Abyss is still under heavy development! There are many planned upcoming features and anyone can contribute to our bucket list of future content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, motion controller required
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system is required

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Drift Abyss is a VR experience where you can fly with your arms, climb with your fists, and discover unique landscapes in this procedurally generated planet.
